item.title: MIUI OS1.0.8.0.UNQMIXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 13 5G / POCO X6 Neo 5G Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 13 5G / POCO X6 Neo 5G Global

Codename: gold

Version: OS1.0.8.0.UNQMIXM | 14.0

Size: 7.7 GB

MD5: 7fe101473ff7480ad03c292b8e39a27f

[System]
Updated the security patch to August 2024. Increased system security.
[Lock screen]
Optimization: New "press and hold to edit" logic for Lock screen reduces accidental triggers
